info.description:
This is the api specification for the Itinerary API.

Introduction
The Itinerary API provides clients and authorized partners access to travel itinerary data. They can now subscribe to events and fetch trips by ID.
info.title: Itinerary API

get.description: Gets the upcoming trips for the given company. Company JWT is required as part of the authorization.
get.summary: v4 - Get Trip Ids by Company

parameters.description: Output schema type. Supported value is id
parameters.name: schema

parameters.description: start date for the query list | format - `2023-01-02`. Date cannot be older than 6 months from now
parameters.name: endDateFrom

parameters.description: end date for the query list, results include this date | format - `2023-01-02`
parameters.name: endDateTo

parameters.description: Get results after a specific start Id
parameters.name: startAfter
